title: Informant Likely to Testify as Defense Witness in Jan. 6 Sedition Trial
description: A man who served as No. 2 to Stewart Rhodes, the group’s leader, is said to have secretly reported to the F.B.I. in the months leading up to the Jan. 6 attack.
dc:creator: Alan Feuer and Adam Goldman
media:description: Trump supporters clashing with police during the Jan. 6 Capitol attack, which led to sedition charges for five members of the far-right Oath Keepers militia.
